content:
Welcome to the SkyBlock Nerds Documentation Page. Here you’ll find a bunch of guides that will hopefully improve your writing significantly.
Although this resource is intended for SBN members, some guides may be applicable for general purposes. Enjoy your stay!
summary: Welcome to the SkyBlock Nerds Documentation Page. Here you’ll find a bunch of guides that will hopefully improve your writing significantly.
title: About Us

content:
YOUR MOMReference pages are ideal for outlining how things work in terse and clear terms. Less concerned with telling a story or addressing a specific use case, they should give a comprehensive outline of what your documenting.
Chessking Read about reference in the Diátaxis framework
